oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the connectivity in finite ad hoc networks (vol 6, pg 437, 2002)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GORE, AD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: on the connectivity in finite ad hoc networks (vol 6, pg 437, 2002)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The probability of connectivity of a one-dimensional finite ad hoc network was derived in [1] by Desai and Manjunath, and further analyzed in [2] by Gore. In this letter, we point out a discrepancy in [2], thus corroborating the original results of [1]. However, [2] provides the exact interpretation of the recursion in [1] and derives the probability of connectivity of a one-dimensional finite sensor network.
